mapper.select: SELECT id, name, model, location, status, purchase_date, description, created_at, updated_at FROM devices ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO devices (name, model, location, status, purchase_date, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{model}, #{location}, #{status}, #{purchaseDate}, #{description}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE devices SET name = #{name}, model = #{model}, location = #{location}, status = #{status}, purchase_date = #{purchaseDate}, description = #{description}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
